issue.title: [C++] Add methods to append dictionary values and dictionary indices directly into DictionaryBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5982](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5982). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In scenarios where a developer has an array of dictionary indices already that reference a known dictionary, it is useful to be able to insert the indices directly, circumventing the hash table lookup. The developer will be responsible for keeping things consistent

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5982?focusedCommentId=17010183) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was done in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/38b01764da445ce6383b60a50d1e9b313857a3d7#diff-ce752fd9d1926a96cbc426de3d32d3ca
